TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartAddingEventArgs extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> method just before adding a control to a Web Parts zone. This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event is called after a control has been added to a Web Parts zone.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs> class contains information that can be used within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event. It provides access to the Web Parts control that is being added and the zone it is being added to.

MemberSignature.Value: public WebPartAddingEventArgs (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase zone, int zoneIndex);

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the index position of a control within its zone.
Docs.value: The numerical order of a control within its zone. The first control in a zone has an index value of zero.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> property indicates the numerical order (or ordinal position) within the zone for the Web Parts control being added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses this property to track and manage its collection of Web Parts controls on a Web page.
> [!IMPORTANT] > The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> property for a control might not equal the index value for the same control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> collection.
